info.title: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Server Report
info.description: Returns an http response and performs a download of a server file.

method.name: get
method.description: Sets the response headers and returns the given file to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $file
parameter.description: The path of the file to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The response file Content-type. See HttpResponse content types.

parameter.name: $suggestedFileName
parameter.description: The suggested file name for downloading the server file. Leave empty and it will be the file original name. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $ignore_user_abort
parameter.description: Indicator for aborting the running script upon user cancelation.

method.returndescription: The file contents to be sent to the output buffer.

parameter.description: The response file Content-type. See HttpResponse content types.
